summary: This is an FBI FD-302 interview summary from April 10, 2020, with a female victim (name redacted). She details being manipulated, sexually abused, and threatened by Leon Black, who she claims ran a sex trafficking ring and connected her to Jeffrey Epstein's circle. The document contains allegations of rape, coercion, and financial transactions between Black and Epstein.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Described as a man who promised the victim modeling opportunities, then manipulated, sexually abused, and threatened her. He allegedly ran a sex trafficking ring, forced her to sign an NDA, and claimed connections to Epstein, Weinstein, and law enforcement.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as someone Leon Black took the victim to meet in Florida. Black allegedly pressured the victim to have sex with Epstein, claiming he had a sex addiction. Epstein is also noted as a recipient of a $10 million transfer from Black.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The victim states she was introduced to Ghislaine Maxwell by Leon Black.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The victim states she was introduced to Prince Andrew by Leon Black.

persons.name: Harvey Weinstein
persons.context: Mentioned by Leon Black to the victim as one of his friends, alongside Epstein and the police.

connections.description: Black allegedly transferred ten million dollars to Epstein around 2015.
Black flew the victim to Epstein's home in Florida and told her Epstein needed to have sex with her.
Black introduced the victim to Ghislaine Maxwell.
Black introduced the victim to Prince Andrew.
Black told the victim he was friends with Harvey Weinstein.
Black allegedly pressured the victim to have sex with Epstein, telling her Epstein had a sex addiction and needed multiple partners.

events.title: Victim meets Leon Black
events.description: The victim, who was modeling, met Leon Black.

events.title: Alleged rape by Leon Black
events.description: Leon Black allegedly forced his way into the victim's apartment and raped her.

events.title: Signing of Non-Disclosure Agreement
events.description: The victim signed a non-disclosure agreement with Leon Black.

events.title: $10M transfer from Black to Epstein
events.description: Leon Black transferred ten million dollars to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: The victim was interviewed telephonically by the FBI regarding her allegations against Leon Black and connections to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: The victim alleges Leon Black manipulated, sexually abused, and threatened her, running a sex trafficking ring.
Leon Black allegedly flew the victim to Jeffrey Epstein's Florida home and pressured her to have sex with Epstein, claiming Epstein had a sex addiction.
The victim states she was introduced to Ghislaine Maxwell and Prince Andrew by Leon Black.
Leon Black allegedly transferred ten million dollars to Jeffrey Epstein around 2015.
The victim signed a non-disclosure agreement with Leon Black in the fall of 2015 and alleges he raped her in her apartment around 2014.
